amendment.description: An amendment numbered 4 printed in Part B of House Report 116-253 to prohibit foreign nationals from influencing American elections by setting up shell companies.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Levin (MI) amendment (A004) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A004) offered by Mr. Levin (MI).
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Levin (MI) amendment (A004) Agreed to by voice vote.
